posts.text: é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ä»»ä½•ç±»å‹å»é‡‡ç”¨ Error åè®®æ¥å®šä¹‰é”™è¯¯ã€‚12345enum PrinterError: Error { case outOfPaper case noToner case onFire} ç”¨ throw å…³é”®å­—æŠ›å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªé”™è¯¯ï¼Œç”¨ throws æ¥æ ‡è®°ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•å¯ä»¥æŠ›å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªé”™è¯¯ã€‚å¦‚æœåœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ä¸­æŠ›å‡ºäº†é”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•å°±ä¼šç«‹åˆ»è¿”å›ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•çš„åœ°æ–¹éœ€è¦å¤„ç†è¿™ä¸ªé”™è¯¯ã€‚123456func send(job: Int, toPrinter printerName: String) throws -> String { if printerName == "Never Has Toner" { throw PrinterError.noToner } return "Job sent"} æœ‰å‡ ç§æ–¹å¼æ¥å¤„ç†é”™è¯¯ã€‚ä¸€ç§æ–¹å¼æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨ do-catch, åœ¨ do çš„å—ä¹‹å†…ï¼Œåœ¨å¯èƒ½æŠ›å‡ºé”™è¯¯çš„æ–¹æ³•å‰å†™ä¸Š tryã€‚é™¤éç»™é”™è¯¯è‡ªå®šä¹‰åå­—ï¼Œå¦åˆ™é”™è¯¯ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å‘½åä¸º error ã€‚123456do { let printerResponse = try send(job: 1040, toPrinter: "Never Has Toner") print(printerResponse)} catch { print(error) // noToner} å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å¤šä¸ª catch å—æ¥å¤„ç†ç‰¹æ®Šçš„é”™è¯¯ã€‚åœ¨ catch å†™çš„æ¨¡å¼å’Œåœ¨ switch-case çš„ case æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ã€‚12345678910do { let printerResponse = try send(job: 1440, toPrinter: "Never Has Toner") print(printerResponse)} catch PrinterError.noToner { print("PrinterError.noToner") // PrinterError.noToner} catch let printerError as PrinterError { print("Printer error: \(printerError).")} catch { print(error)} å¦å¤–ä¸€ä¸ªå¤„ç†é”™è¯¯çš„æ–¹å¼æ˜¯ç”¨ try? æ¥å°†ç»“æœè½¬æ¢ä¸ºå¯é€‰çš„ã€‚å¦‚æœä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°æŠ›äº†ä¸€ä¸ªé”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªç‰¹å®šçš„é”™è¯¯è¢«ä¸¢å¼ƒäº†ï¼Œå‡½æ•°çš„ç»“æœæ˜¯ nilï¼Œå¦è€…ï¼Œç»“æœæ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•è¿”å›çš„å¯é€‰å€¼ç±»å‹çš„å€¼ã€‚1234let printerSuccess = try? send(job: 1884, toPrinter: "Mergenthaler")let printerFailure = try? send(job: 1885, toPrinter: "Never Has Toner")print(printerSuccess)print(printerFailure) åœ¨ defer å…³é”®å­—åå†™ä¸€ä¸ªä»£ç å—ï¼Œè¯¥ä»£ç å—åœ¨å‡½æ•°è¿”å›ä¹‹å‰ä¸”åœ¨å‡½æ•°ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰å…¶ä»–ä»£ç ä¹‹åæ‰§è¡Œã€‚ æ— è®ºå‡½æ•°æ˜¯å¦æŠ›å‡ºé”™è¯¯ï¼Œéƒ½ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œä»£ç ã€‚1234567891011121314var fridgeIsOpen = falselet fridgeContent = ["milk", "eggs", "leftovers"]func fridgeContains(_ food: String) -> Bool { fridgeIsOpen = true defer { fridgeIsOpen = false } let result = fridgeContent.contains(food) return result}fridgeContains("banana")print(fridgeIsOpen) // false æŸ¥çœ‹æºç  å‚è€ƒï¼š1. è‹¹æœå®˜ç½‘ swift æŒ‡å—

Now 100% adjusted.struct SimpleStructure: ExampleProtocol { var simpleDescription: String = "A simple structure" mutating func adjust() { simpleDescription += " (adjusted)" }}var b = SimpleStructure()b.adjust()print(b.simpleDescription) // A simple structure (adjusted) ä½¿ç”¨ extension æ¥å‘ä¸€ä¸ªå·²ç»å­˜åœ¨çš„ç±»å‹æ·»åŠ åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªè®¡ç®—å±æ€§ã€‚æ‚¨å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨æ‰©å±•æ¥å°†åè®®ä¸€è‡´æ€§æ·»åŠ åˆ°åœ¨å…¶ä»–åœ°æ–¹å£°æ˜çš„ç±»å‹ï¼Œç”šè‡³æ·»åŠ åˆ°ä»åº“æˆ–æ¡†æ¶å¯¼å…¥çš„ç±»å‹ã€‚123456789extension Int: ExampleProtocol { var simpleDescription: String { return "The number \(self)" } mutating func adjust() { self += 42 }}print(7.simpleDescription) // The number 7 æ‚¨å¯ä»¥åƒä½¿ç”¨ä»»ä½•å…¶ä»–å‘½åç±»å‹ä¸€æ ·ä½¿ç”¨åè®®åç§° - ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºå…·æœ‰ä¸åŒç±»å‹ä½†éƒ½ç¬¦åˆå•ä¸ªåè®®çš„å¯¹è±¡é›†åˆã€‚ ä½¿ç”¨ç±»å‹ä¸ºåè®®ç±»å‹çš„å€¼æ—¶ï¼Œåè®®å®šä¹‰ä¹‹å¤–çš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸å¯ç”¨ã€‚123let protocolValue: ExampleProtocol = aprint(protocolValue.simpleDescription)// print(protocolValue.anotherProperty) // Value of type 'ExampleProtocol' has no member 'anotherProperty' æŸ¥çœ‹æºç  å‚è€ƒï¼š1. è‹¹æœå®˜ç½‘ swift æŒ‡å—

èµ‹äº†ç‰¹æ®Šçš„å€¼ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä»è¿™ä¸ªä¹‹åçš„å†åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªçš„åŸºç¡€ä¸Šè¿›è¡ŒåŠ  1 è®°æ•°ã€‚ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829enum Rank: Int { case ace = 1 case two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten case jack, queen, king case test = 20 case test2 func simpleDescription() -> String { switch self { case .ace: return "ace" case .jack: return "jack" case .queen: return "queen" case .king: return "king" default: return String(self.rawValue) } }}let ace = Rank.acelet aceRawValue = ace.rawValueprint(aceRawValue) // 1print(Rank.jack.rawValue) // 11print(Rank.test.rawValue) // 20print(Rank.test2.rawValue) // 21 æšä¸¾çš„ç±»å‹å¯ä»¥æ˜¯ String å’Œæµ®ç‚¹å‹12345678910111213141516enum Sports: String { case football, basketball case running = "run"}print(Sports.football.rawValue) // footballprint(Sports.running.rawValue) // runenum Eyesight: Float { case a case b case c = 5.2}print(Eyesight.a.rawValue) // 0.0print(Eyesight.c.rawValue) // 5.2 å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ rawValue æ¥åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸€ä¸ªæšä¸¾1234if let convertedRank = Rank(rawValue: 3) { let threeDescription = convertedRank.simpleDescription() print(threeDescription)} æšä¸¾çš„ case å€¼å°±æ˜¯å®é™…çš„å€¼ï¼Œè€Œä¸ä»…ä»…å†™å®ƒä»¬çš„ rawValue ä¸€ç§æ–¹å¼ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰å¾ˆæœ‰æ„ä¹‰çš„å€¼ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¸å¿…å†™ã€‚12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728enum Suit { case spades, hearts, diamonds, clubs func simpleDescription() -> String { switch self { case .spades: return "spades" case .hearts: return "hearts" case .diamonds: return "diamonds" case .clubs: return "clubs" } } func color() -> String { switch self { case .spades, .clubs: return "black" case .hearts, .diamonds: return "diamonds" } }}let hearts = Suit.heartslet heartsDescription = hearts.simpleDescription()print(Suit.spades.color()) // black ä¸Šé¢æšä¸¾ä¾‹å­åœ¨å®ƒå®šä¹‰æ—¶å°±å·²ç»ç¡®å®šäº†ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ç›¸åŒçš„ case çš„åŸå§‹å€¼éƒ½ç›¸åŒã€‚è¿˜æœ‰ä¸€ç§æƒ…å†µæ˜¯ï¼Œæšä¸¾å…³è”çš„åŸå§‹å€¼å¯ä»¥åœ¨å®ƒå®ä¾‹åŒ–æ—¶æ‰ç¡®å®šï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”åŸå§‹å€¼å¯ä»¥ä¸åŒ1234567891011121314enum ServerResponse { case result(String, String) case failure(String)}let success = ServerResponse.result("6:00 am", "8:09 pm")let failure = ServerResponse.failure("Out of cheese.")switch success { case let.result(sunrise, sunset): print("Sunrise is at \(sunrise) and sunset is at \(sunset).") // Sunrise is at 6:00 am and sunset is at 8:09 pm. case let .failure(message): print("Failure... \(message)")} ä½¿ç”¨ struct å…³é”®å­—æ¥åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªç»“æ„ä½“ï¼Œç»“æ„ä½“æ”¯æŒå¾ˆå¤šä¸ç±»ç›¸åŒçš„è¡Œä¸ºï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬æ–¹æ³•å’Œåˆå§‹åŒ–æ–¹æ³•ã€‚å…¶ä¸­æœ€é‡è¦çš„ä¸åŒæ˜¯ç»“æ„ä½“æ˜¯ä¸€ç›´è¢«æ‹·è´åœ¨ä¼ å€¼çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œè€Œç±»æ˜¯è¢«å½“ä½œå¼•ç”¨æ¥ä¼ é€’çš„ã€‚123456789struct Card { var rank: Rank var suit: Suit func simpleDescription() -> String { return "The \(rank.simpleDescription()) of \(suit.simpleDescription())" }}let threeOfSpades = Card(rank: .three, suit: .spades)let threeOfSpadesDescription = threeOfSpades.simpleDescription() æŸ¥çœ‹æºç  å‚è€ƒï¼š1. è‹¹æœå®˜ç½‘ swift æŒ‡å—

Person { var name = "zhangguangqun" let greetWord = "hello"// ç±»ä¸­å£°æ˜çš„å±æ€§çš„éœ€è¦åˆå§‹åŒ–ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ç¼–è¯‘å‡ºé”™// var age: Int // stored property 'age' without initial value prevents synthesized initializers func selfIntroduction() -> String { return "\(greetWord), my name is \(name)." } func greet(name: String) -> String { return "\(greetWord), \(name)" }} åˆ›å»ºç±»çš„å®ä¾‹ï¼ŒåŠä½¿ç”¨å®ä¾‹æ¥è®¿é—®å®ä¾‹çš„å±æ€§å’Œæ–¹æ³•ã€‚123var p = Person()print(p.selfIntroduction()) // hello, my name is zhangguangqun.print(p.greet(name: "jack")) // hello, jack ç±»çš„åˆå§‹åŒ–ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ init åˆå§‹åŒ– (æ³¨æ„ init æ–¹æ³•å‰æ²¡æœ‰ func å…³é”®å­—ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸ä¼šæœ‰è¿”å›å€¼)ï¼Œinit æ–¹æ³•å¯ä»¥é‡è½½ã€‚1234567891011121314151617181920212223class Fruits { var color: String var weight: Float = 0 init(color: String) { self.color = color } init(color: String, weight: Float) {// ä½¿ç”¨ self è¡¨ç¤ºè¯¥å®ä¾‹ï¼Œæ¥åŒºåˆ†å®ä¾‹å±æ€§å’Œæ–¹æ³•ä¼ è¿›æ¥çš„å‚æ•°ã€‚ self.color = color self.weight = weight } func description() { print("the color of this fruit is \(color), it weight \(weight)g") }}var apple = Fruits(color: "çº¢è‰²")var banana = Fruits(color: "é»„è‰²", weight: 80)apple.description() // the color of this fruit is çº¢è‰², it weight 0.0gbanana.description() // the color of this fruit is é»„è‰², it weight 80.0g
